item.description:
Please join us for the second annual shoreline wine festival. 13 CT wineries will offer samples of more than 50 wines. Tickets are 25$ in advance or $30 at the door. Cost includes unlimited wine samples and a souvenir wine glass. Musical entertainment, food and wine seminars will also be available throughout the day.

go to www.shorelinewinefestival.com for tickets and more information.
item.how_to_find_us: I will provide a cell phone number to people who have RSVP'd

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Shoreline Wine Festival
